article.title: Release Notes
article.para: This document summarizes the significant changes since the 2.0.6 release.
There's nothing significant about the order in which the changes are listed except that I usually try to put the big ones near the top..

listitem.para: Made missing links stand out better
Allow broken links to flow through the preprocessing step in the pipeline. It's possible that downstream stylesheets will know what to do with them.
Support XLink simple links on tag elements.
